entries.femaleVariant: Hey, everyone! Welcome to Infoflash! So, did y'all hear Arasaka's got a new top dog? Yorinobu Arasaka.
It's a pretty amazing coincidence, really. Four billion people and the best candidate for CEO is the son of the last one. What're the odds...
But seriously, this Yorinobu is one colorful character. When he was a kid, he ran away from home, joined a gang, extorted, robbed, abuducted...
Hey! I guess he really was the most qualified for the job!
Anyway, guess a few years on the streets was enough so apologized to the fam. Saburo said he didn't hold any hard feelings in his heart. Hard to do that when you don't have one, after all.
Once back in the Arasaka fold, Yorinobu was named VP of Process Optimization. I think that was daddy's way of telling him to go stand in the corner.
And hey, now he's CEO. But did ya hear he didn't pay any income tax last year? Had no idea bein' Arasaka CEO paid so bad. You folks ever see him on the street, don't forget to flip a coin in his cup.
Thanks for the listen, Night City. See ya 'round!
